page.title: 10Clapham Parish Church
page.content: Clapham parish church is Saint Thomas a Beckett. It is situated just behind Ursula Taylor school. The present Rector's name is Graham Cansdale. The church in Clapham is the centre of a flourishing Christian Community. There are many groups that meet that are associated wirh the church,youth group,house groups,Sunday school. The parish church keeps close links with the school. The middle H.O.R.S.A unit of classrooms on our school site has been taken over by the church for use as church Hall.
